name: Cargo (Overload Engine Demo)
description:
Context

Cargo is a small game made with Overload Engine, a game engine made from scratch in 5 months.

Game

The game was done in 1 week. It takes place in a sci-fi environment.

Story

The space hangar A113 was attacked by aliens. One survivor.

A space cargo ship, this is where you survived for the past 2 days. Until now...
